title: Figure, "The Ballerina Galina Ulanova in the Role of Maria", ca. 1950

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "The Ballerina Galina Ulanova in the Role of Maria", ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-236.
